snippet.title: 1993 Shenandoah - Nintendo Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
It happened towards the end of the Interstellar Wars. Chaos was spreading and a band of elite mercenaries started acting more like pirates and looters than soldiers. With the notorious and infamous Colonel Nestor as their leader, they got their hands on the Shenandoah - a device designed to terraform barren planets. With the Shenandoah in their possession, Nestor and his men started to build an army that now poses a great threat to the known star systems.

Your mission? Take down Nestor and bring back the Shenandoah.
Buy now: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/1993-shenandoah-switch/

1993 Shenandoah is a real retro game - not a game made to look retro.
Originally developed as an Amiga game in 1993 - Now released on Nintendo Switch. With no more than 32 colors per screen. Restored and brought to life with craftsmanship by feral game developers sprung from the Swedish AAA game industry.

Presented to you by The indie game developer studio close to the arctic circle.

https://www.nintendolife.com/news/2020/07/after_27_years_amiga_shmup_1993_shenandoah_finally_launches_on_switch

https://nintendoeverything.com/1993-shenandoah-landing-on-switch-next-week-after-starting-development-more-than-20-years-ago/

https://gaminglyfe.com/1993-shenandoah-out-now-on-switch/
